resources.string: Admin apps are managed here: Settings->Security->Device administrators
This app needs admin rights to be able to lock the screen when it\'s in the pocket or bag, etc.
No proximity sensors found. Please make sure your device has this hardware feature.
App \'Proximity Screen Locker\' is enabled as Device Admin.
